Interface IRequestNotifier

  • All Superinterfaces:
    INotify
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ARequestNotifier

    public interface IRequestNotifier
extends INotify
    IRequestNotifier interface defines methods to register listeners,
    Version:
    $Revision$, $Date$
